Class MissionPackageFileAttachmentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.missionpackage.event.MissionPackageFileAttachmentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMissionPackageEventHandler
    public class MissionPackageFileAttachmentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMissionPackageEventHandler
    Handles special case processing for files which are attached to Map Items
